function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases spread through skin contact with sensors or wearables","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of sensors and wearables, and limiting shared use among individuals","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antimicrobial coatings on sensors, and contactless sensors","People":"Users, caregivers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare facilities, and individuals"},{"Description":"Poor contact with skin leading to compromised sensor accuracy","Impact":"Inaccurate health monitoring and diagnosis","Mitigation":"Education on correct sensor placement, development of sensor designs that maintain good skin contact, and regular calibration of sensors","Technologies":"Improved sensor adhesives, wearable designs that promote skin contact, and sensor calibration technology","People":"Users, caregivers, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare facilities, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Skin irritation and discomfort from prolonged wear of sensors and wearables","Impact":"Reduced user compliance and discomfort","Mitigation":"Developing skin-friendly adhesives, promoting breaks from continuous wear, and designing comfortable wearable form factors","Technologies":"Skin-friendly adhesive materials, breathable and flexible wearable materials, and ergonomic wearable designs","People":"Users, caregivers, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare facilities, and regulatory bodies"}]}
